message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business. Given its high quality and unique features, I'm confident it will be a valuable addition to your operations. To ensure we're both satisfied with the transaction, I propose a price of $15000 for the product.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I've done some research and I believe that's a fair price based on similar products in the market. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
